channel.title: soup on The Open Source Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in soup on The Open Source Cookbook

item.title: Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup
item.description: Ingredients 1 tablespoon butter 1/2 cup chopped onion 1/2 cup chopped celery 4 (14.5 ounce) cans chicken broth 1 (14.5 ounce) can vegetable broth 1/2 pound chopped cooked chicken breast 1â€‰1/2 cups egg noodles 1 cup sliced carrots 1/2 teaspoon dried basil 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano salt and ground black pepper to taste Directions Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion and celery and cook until just tender, about 5 minutes.

item.title: Butternut Squash Soup
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons butter 1 small onion, chopped 1 stalk celery, chopped 1 medium carrot, chopped 2 medium potatoes, cubed 1 medium butternut squash - peeled, seeded, and cubed 1 (32 fluid ounce) container chicken stock salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste Directions Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat, and cook onion, celery, carrot, potatoes, and squash until lightly browned, about 5 minutes.
